amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that would limit veterans' ability to choose VA health care.

action.text: Amendment SA 104 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 104 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 50. Record Vote Number: 14.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 104.
Amendment SA 104 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Tester.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 104 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 50. Record Vote Number: 14.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 104 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Tester.
